Dm_GE_0009_Text_005_b:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Notice_01>Right now those hives are durable and
nearly impervious to attack.
Dm_GE_0009_Text_003_b:
But it's not only the one hive... There are
three to deal with, each just outside the
town gates.
Dm_GE_0009_Text_001_b:
There's a Gibdo hive... Just like the one
that appeared near Kara Kara Bazaar.
Dm_GE_0009_Text_003_b_00:
I don't need a clairvoyant sand seal to
know a massive Gibdo attack is coming.
Dm_GE_0009_Text_016_b:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Angry_00>Link. For now, we should focus on
protecting Gerudo Town from the
enemies at our gates.
Dm_GE_0009_Text_008_b:
<snd:Determination_00>So when they launch their attack, that's
our chance to strike.
Dm_GE_0009_Text_014_b: <sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Lady Riju? Link? Is something the matter?
Dm_GE_0009_Text_006_b:
But when they open and begin releasing
Gibdos, they're vulnerable.
Dm_GE_0009_Text_002_b:
<snd:Sad_01>Both the hive and those tornadoes were
reported to have shown up at the same
time too.
Dm_GE_0009_Text_007_b:
The Gibdos won't wait outside our
walls forever...
Dm_GE_0009_Text_013_b: "Come..." Is it calling out to us?
